actions.committee: Senate Committee on Labor and Public Welfare
actions.text: Referred to Senate Committee on Labor and Public Welfare.

official_title: A bill to amend the Federal Food, Drug, and Cosmetic Act to require the label on infant foods to disclose, by percentage, the weight of all ingredients of such foods and to require the label on certain breakfast cereals to disclose the sugar content thereof.
short_title: Infant and Child Nutrition Protection Act

summary.text: Infant and Child Nutrition Protection Act - Requires, under the Federal Food, Drug, and Cosmetic Act, that the label on infant foods disclose, by percentage, the weight of all ingredients of such foods and requires the label on specified breakfast cereals to disclose the sugar content thereof.

titles.title: Infant and Child Nutrition Protection Act

A bill to amend the Federal Food, Drug, and Cosmetic Act to require the label on infant foods to disclose, by percentage, the weight of all ingredients of such foods and to require the label on certain breakfast cereals to disclose the sugar content thereof.
